{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19908v1", "title": "Finitness of measured homoclinic classes with large Lyapunov exponents
  for $\mathcal{C}^2$ surface diffeomorphisms", "summary": "We show the finiteness of homoclinic classes carrying measures with large
Lyapunov exponents for $\mathcal{C}^2$ surface diffeomorphisms. As a
consequence, we derive the finiteness of the set of ergodic measures of maximal
entropy, in the case where the entropy of the system is large.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS", "published": "2025-04-28T15:40:14Z"}
